short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get insight into the page load performance of the website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension captures the page performance for every URL accessed by browser.
The extension also exposes the captured data through a JavaScript variable (pageTimingLog) in each tab.
